mÃ¬nh Ä‘i hai ngÆ°á»i , gá»i 4 mÃ³n , Ä‘á»“_Äƒn cÅ©ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c nhÆ°ng vá»›i mÃ¬nh thÃ¬ khÃ´ng há»£p láº¯m , nhÃ¢n_viÃªn ráº¥t nhiá»‡t_tÃ¬nh , Ä‘em Ä‘á»“_Äƒn ra phá»¥c_vá»¥ táº­n_tÃ¬nh , thay vá»‰ thÆ°á»ng_xuyÃªn Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘á»“_Äƒn khÃ´ng bá»‹ khÃ©t , nhÆ°ng_mÃ  Äƒn háº¿t rau thÃ¬ xin thÃªm chá» dÃ i cá»• khÃ´ng tháº¥y , cÃ³_láº½ lÃ  vÃ¬ Ä‘á»“ miá»…n_phÃ­ . tÃ­nh tiá»n thÃ¬ khÃ¡ lÃ¢u , mÃ¬nh chá» cá»¡ 20p Ä‘á»ƒ xÃ¡c_nháº­n mÃ³n Äƒn , chá» thÃªm 5p xuáº¥t hoÃ¡_Ä‘Æ¡n , vÃ  chá» Ä‘á»ƒ nháº­n tiá»n dÆ° khÃ¡ lÃ¢u nhÆ° vÃ¬ quáº£n_lÃ½ cháº¡y ra nÃ³i chá»‹ chá»‹u_khÃ³ ra quáº§y Ä‘á»©ng chá» chá»© ngá»“i á»Ÿ bÃ n thÃ¬ tiá»n thá»‘i láº¡i khÃ¡ lÃ¢u ( bÃ  nÃ y muá»‘n Ä‘uá»‘i khÃ¡ch vÃ¬ Ä‘Ã£ láº¥y_Ä‘Æ°á»£c tiá»n ) ra quáº§y tÃ­nh tiá»n thÃ¬ Ä‘á»©ng chÆ¡ Ä‘Ã³ khÃ´ng cÃ³ nhÃ¢n_viÃªn tráº£ láº¡i tiá»n nÃªn mÃ¬nh bá» vá» luÃ´n . ráº¥t thÃ­ch nhÃ¢n_viÃªn á»Ÿ Ä‘Ã¢y nhÆ°ng quáº£n_lÃ½ thÃ¬ bÃ³_tay ! kiá»ƒu nÃ y thÃ¬ Ä‘á»“_Äƒn cÃ³ ngon Ä‘i_ná»¯a cÅ©ng khÃ´ng quay láº¡i !
khÃ´ng biáº¿t chi_nhÃ¡nh thÃ nh_phá»‘ nhÆ°_tháº¿_nÃ o nhÆ°g á»Ÿ bÃ¬nh_dÆ°Æ¡ng quÃ¡ tháº¥t_vá»ng . mÃ¬nh Ä‘i Äƒn láº§n thá»© 2 rá»“i , láº§n Ä‘áº§u cÅ©ng khÃ´ng tháº¥y thÃ­ch_thÃº láº¯m . tá»›i nÆ¡i cÃ³ 1 anh Ä‘áº¿n há»i Ä‘i máº¥y ngÆ°á»i Ä‘á»ƒ xáº¿p chá»— ngá»“i , anh nÃ y dá»…_thÆ°Æ¡ng + 1 cÃ¡i , xong vÃ´ chá»— ngá»“i lÃ  tháº¥y háº¿t mÃºn + , cÃ¡i khay há»©ng má»¡ thá»«a á»Ÿ dá»©oi ko biáº¿t há»©ng tá»« khi nÃ o , mÃ  chá»‰ cÃ³ thay cÃ¡i khay nÆ°á»›ng á»Ÿ trÃªn , á»Ÿ dÆ°á»›i má»¡ váº«n xÃ¨o_xÃ¨o , khÃ³i bay mÃ¹i má»¡ bay tháº³ng vÃ o máº·t phÃ¡t ngÃ¡n dÃ¹ chÆ°a Äƒn gÃ¬ . chÆ°a xong , tui gá»i 1 ba_chá»‰ heo nÆ°á»›ng , 1 dáº» sÆ°á»n bÃ² sá»‘t dáº§u mÃ¨ nÆ°á»›ng , 1 cÆ¡m trá»™n , 1 coca , 1 sprite . order xong , chá» khoáº£ng 10p má»›i cÃ³ ng mang panchan ra , panchan chÃ¡n nháº¥t trong chuá»—i táº¥t_cáº£ cÃ¡c chi_nhÃ¡nh gogi tui tá»«ng Ä‘i , 1 kimchi cáº£i tháº£o , 1 salad dáº§u dáº¥m , 1 giÃ¡ trá»™n , 1 rong_biá»ƒn , 1 báº¯p_cáº£i mayonnaise - háº¿t , ko cho bÃ¬nh ná»©Æ¡c lá»c luÃ´n . chá» thÃªm 1 lÃºc khÃ¡ khÃ¡ lÃ¢u má»›i mang ra dÄ©a ba_chá»‰ + rá»• rau_sá»‘ng - ko cÃ³ lÃ¡ mÃ¨ - thay báº±ng lÃ¡ tÃ­a_tÃ´ = . = " , ok nÆ°á»›ng Äƒn dáº§n , vá»«a Äƒn vá»«a tÃ¡m thiÃªn_Ä‘á»‹a háº¿t ná»­a thá»‹t thÃ¬ mang ra cÆ¡m trá»™n - mÃ³n nÃ y cÅ©ng Ä‘á»±oc - trá»« cÃ¡i kimchi á»Ÿ Ä‘Ã¢y chua quÃ¡ - khÃ´ng biáº¿t do xui Ä‘i trÃºng ngÃ y hay_sao . chua_lÃ¨ cáº£ kimchi panchan cáº£ kimchi trá»™n . mÃ£i ko tháº¥y thá»‹t bÃ² , gá»i nhÃ¢n_viÃªn láº¡i há»i - dáº¡ - Ä‘i máº¥t , há»“i lÃ¢u thiá»‡t lÃ¢u ko tháº¥y , tháº¥y 1 chá»‹ bÃ© - chacáº¯c lÃ  sup , xinh_xáº¯n mÃ  máº·t nhÆ° cÃ¡i bá»‹ , há»i chá»‹ Æ¡i sao bÃ² bÃ n em chÆ°a tháº¥y ná»¯a , Äƒn háº¿t dá»“ Äƒn rá»“i , náº¿u háº¿t bÃ² cho em Ä‘á»•i mÃ³n khÃ¡c , máº·t nhÄƒn_nhÃ³ quay Ä‘i , quay láº¡i vá»›i phiáº¿u táº¡m tÃ­nh tiá»n - há»i láº¡i , á»§a ko cÃ³ bÃ² thiá»‡t háº£ chá»‹ , nhÄƒn_nhÃ³ , chá»‹ kÃªu cancel e cancel rá»“i , tÃ­nh tiá»n luÃ´n háº£ anh_chá»‹ = . = " tui thiá»‡t cau_cÃ³

chi_nhÃ¡nh bÃªn lÃª_lai - an_ninh tháº­t_sá»± ráº¥t tá»‡ . vá»«a_rá»“i mÃ¬nh vÃ o uá»‘ng vÃ  bá»‹ máº¥t chiáº¿c xe_Ä‘áº¡p Ä‘iá»‡n trc cá»­a_tiá»‡m . cÃ³_láº½ lÃ  do mÃ¬nh quÃ¡ tin_tÆ°á»Ÿng tiá»‡m nÃªn ko nghÄ© nhiá»u mÃ  bÆ°á»›c vÃ o quÃ¡n thoáº£i_mÃ¡i , rá»“i sau Ä‘Ã³ thÃ¬ Ä‘c bÃ¡o lÃ  máº¥t xe do sÃ¡ng ko cÃ³ báº£o_vá»‡ giá»¯ xe , sÃ¡ng Ä‘á»ƒ cho nhÃ¢n_viÃªn canh , nhÆ°ng nhÃ¢n_viÃªn lÃ m_gÃ¬ Ä‘Ã³ Ä‘á»ƒ rá»“i ko thÃ¨m trÃ´ng xe cho khÃ¡ch : ) . Ä‘Ã£_váº­y chá»§ quÃ¡n ráº¥t vÃ´_trÃ¡ch_nhiá»‡m , khÃ´ng thÃ¨m ra gáº·p_máº·t mÃ  chá»‰ nc Ä‘t qua Ä‘t cá»§a chá»‹ quáº£n_lÃ­ , vÃ  chá»‰ bá»“i_thÆ°á»ng 25% . nhÆ°ng rá»“i chá»‹ quáº£n_lÃ­ Ä‘á»«ng ra tráº£ 50% . mÃ¬nh ráº¥t khen_ngá»£i thÃ¡i_Ä‘á»™ trÃ¡ch_nhiá»‡m cá»§a chá»‹ quáº£n_lÃ­ nhÆ°ng tháº­t_sá»± mÃ¬nh ko há» hÃ i_lÃ²ng vá»›i má»©c bá»“i_thÆ°á»ng nÃ y . xe mÃ¬nh chá»‰ má»›i cháº¡y Ä‘c 1 thÃ¡ng , vÃ  do nhÃ¢n_viÃªn ko canh kÄ© lÃ m máº¥t xe thÃ¬ mÃ¬nh tháº¥y má»©c 50% lÃ  ko há» cÃ´ng_báº±ng cho phÃ­a mÃ¬nh , mÃ¬nh vÃ o tiá»‡m Äƒn_uá»‘ng cÃ³ tráº£ tiá»n , thÃ¬ nhÃ¢n_viÃªn pháº£i cÃ³ trÃ¡ch_nhiá»‡m vá»›i mÃ¬nh chá»© ! mÃ¬nh tháº¥y lá»—i cá»§a mÃ¬nh lÃ  quÃ¡ tin_tÆ°á»Ÿng tiá»‡m : ( . cÅ©ng may lÃ  xe_Ä‘áº¡p Ä‘iá»‡n , chá»© máº¥t cáº£ xe_mÃ¡y thÃ¬ mÃ¬nh ko biáº¿t quÃ¡n sáº½ giáº£i_quyáº¿t ntn , cháº³ng_láº½ cá»© chá»‰ Ä‘á»n cho khÃ¡ch_hÃ ng 50% lÃ  xong chuyÃªn ? ! mÃ¬nh hi_vá»ng sau chuyá»‡n nÃ y tiá»‡m sáº½ rÃºt kinh_nghiá»‡m vÃ  cáº£ mÃ¬nh cÅ©ng váº­y : ) . nhÆ°ng xin_lá»—i báº£n_thÃ¢n mÃ¬nh sáº½ ko bh Ä‘áº¿n tiá»‡m ná»¯a . tháº­t_sá»± thÃ¬ uá»‘ng 1 cháº§u trÃ  sá»¯a mÃ  máº¥t máº¥y triá»‡u thÃ¬ cÅ©ng khÃ¡ chÃ¡t Ä‘áº¥y : )
i work in district 1 not far from taco_king . delivery was decent , only taking 30 minutes . everything else was a disaster . the photos on the menu are false advertising and the food looks nothing like it . we paid 30,000 dong per tostada which was missing the vegetables - it was only a small piece of fried bread the size of a big chip and a small cup of refried beans . we paid 55,000 per small burrito , but there were no vegetables or other dressings with it . we paid 30,000 per small taco , which also had no veggies and dressings - only meat and shell . for the same price , you can go to a more popular mexican restaurant and get an appetizer that is more filling . after spending about 100,000 dong each , we ' re still going out to get a lunch because it was not filling at all . picture 1 : they used so many little plastic containers for each tortilla ( the size of a chip ) and sauce

Ä‘Æ°á»£c má»™t chá»‹ chÆ¡i chung giá»›i_thiá»‡u quÃ¡n nÃ y nÃªn Ä‘i Äƒn thá»­ . khÃ´ng_gian ko cÃ³ gÃ¬ ná»•i_báº­t , menu tháº­p_cáº©m mÃ³n hÃ n nháº­t trung , giÃ¡ nÆ°á»›c cao , cÃ³ má»™t_sá»‘ mÃ³n giÃ¡ khÃ´ng há»£p_lÃ½ . cÆ¡m cuá»™n nhÆ° Ä‘á»“ cho con_nÃ­t Äƒn , bÃ© xÃ­u xiu , bÃ¡nh gáº¡o Ä‘Æ°á»£c , mÃ¬ xÃ o giÃ²n dÄ©a to nhiá»u rau cÅ©ng ok , bÃ¡nh_xÃ¨o thÃ¬ trang_trÃ­ khÃ´ng nhÆ° nhá»¯ng quÃ¡n khÃ¡c , Äƒn cÅ©ng táº¡m nhÆ°ng nguyÃªn_liá»‡u quÃ¡ Ä‘Æ¡n_giáº£n vÃ  Ã­t , sá»¥n gÃ  rang muá»‘i á»›t thÃ¬ nháº¡t_nháº½o , táº©m cá»¥c bá»™t to rá»“i chiÃªn , sÃ² Ä‘iá»‡p chiÃªn thÃ¬ cháº¯c mua sáºµn Ä‘Ã´ng_láº¡nh vá» chiÃªn bÃ¡n ğŸ˜± . mÃ¬nh tháº¥y mÃ¬ xÃ o , bÃ¡nh gáº¡o vá»›i bÃ¡nh_xÃ¨o lÃ  Äƒn Ä‘Æ°á»£c trong táº¥t_cáº£ . quÃ¡n trong cÅ©ng cÃ³ nhiá»u khÃ¡ch_hÃ ng vá»›i nhiá»u Ä‘á»™ tuá»•i á»§ng_há»™ nhÆ°ng nÃ³i tháº­t mÃ¬nh Ä‘i Äƒn_uá»‘ng cÅ©ng chÆ°a tá»«ng gáº·p kiá»ƒu nhÃ¢n_viÃªn nhÆ° quÃ¡n nÃ y , cÃ¹ng láº¯m vÃ¬ quÃ¡n Ä‘Ã´ng phá»¥c_vá»¥ chÆ°a chu_Ä‘Ã¡o thÃ´i , chá»© quÃ¡n nÃ y mÃ¬nh Ä‘áº¿n lÃºc 5h hÆ¡n , khÃ¡ch Ä‘Æ°á»£c 1 bÃ n , mÃ¬nh Ä‘áº¿n lÃ  bÃ n thá»© 2 . mÃ¬nh ngá»“i bÃ n bá»‡t , menu thÃ¬ vá»©t cÃ¡i báº¡ch xuá»‘ng bÃ n , Ä‘Ãºng lÃ  quÃ¡n oder theo kiá»ƒu viáº¿t giáº¥y nhÆ°ng máº¥y chá»‹ Ä‘i cÃ¹ng chÆ°a quen nÃªn lÃ¢u_lÃ¢u láº¡i quÃªn oder mÃ³n vá»›i phá»¥c_vá»¥ . cáº­u phá»¥c_vá»¥ Ä‘Ã³ giáº£ cÃ¢m_Ä‘iáº¿c nhÃ¬n khin khá»‰n ko nÃ³i_nÄƒng chi , cÅ©ng bÃ³_tay . bÆ°ng Ä‘á»“ lÃªn thÃ¬ tháº©y Ä‘Ã³ cho tá»¥i mÃ¬nh tá»± xá»­ , kÃªu dá»n dÄ©a cÅ©ng ko thÃ¨m nhÃ¬n . oder mÃ³n xuá»‘ng báº¿p lÃ m Ä‘á»©ng ngay cáº§u_thang nÃ³i vá»ng xuá»‘ng lÃ m Ä‘ang Äƒn giáº­t_mÃ¬nh luÃ´n , tÃ©_ra cáº­u ta biáº¿t nÃ³i ko cÃ³ cÃ¢m_Ä‘iáº¿c gÃ¬ . quÃ¡n máº·t_tiá»n Ä‘Æ°á»ng dá»… tÃ¬m , khÃ´ng_gian nhá» , quÃ¡n Ä‘Ã´ng nÃªn ngá»“i chá»• ngá»“i sÃ¡t nhau , mÃ¡y_láº¡nh mÃ¡t_máº» . do quÃ¡n Ä‘Ã´ng Ä‘á»“ dá»n xuá»‘ng Ä‘á»ƒ ngay dÆ°á»›i quáº§y Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘á»“ . mua vá» nÃªn khÃ¡ nhanh khÃ´ng pháº£i chá» lÃ¢u , nhÆ°ng quÃ¡n báº£o khÃ´ng_sá»­_dá»¥ng_ecard_cho_mang_vá» . mÃ¬nh Ä‘i Äƒn quÃ¡n nÃ o Ã¡p_dá»¥ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c ecard cÅ©ng Ä‘á»u sá»­_dá»¥ng cho mang vá» Ä‘Æ°á»£c bÃ¬nh_thÆ°á»ng . mÃ¬nh nghÄ© do nhÃ¢n_viÃªn báº¥m mÃ¡y rá»“i lÆ°á»i nháº­p láº¡i nÃªn nÃ³i váº­y . cáº£m_tháº¥y khÃ´ng cÃ³ áº¥n_tÆ°á»£ng tá»‘t cho láº§n Ä‘áº§u_tiÃªn táº¡i chi_nhÃ¡nh nÃ y . mua vá» 4 pháº§n tá»•ng_cá»™ng 122 : gá»“m 2 kem xÃ´i dá»«a vÃ  2 kem cá»‘m dá»«a . kem mÃ¹i dá»«a bÃ©o thÆ¡m , ngon . cÃ³ thÃªm topping nhÆ° báº¯p , Ä‘áº­u_phá»™ng ... há»™p Ä‘á»±ng bao_bÃ¬ Ä‘áº¹p , dá»…_thÆ°Æ¡ng . kem Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»ƒ riÃªng , nhÃ  gáº§n nÃªn kem khÃ´ng bá»‹ cháº£y , náº¿u nhÃ  xa kem sáº½ cháº£y ra khi vá» tá»›i nÆ¡i . tuy kem ngon mÃ  quÃ¡n Ä‘Ã´ng cháº­t vÃ  tá»«_chá»‘i ecard khi mua vá» lÃ  Ä‘iá»ƒm trá»« vá» dá»‹ch_vá»¥ !

cháº¯c do ko há»£p_kháº©u vá»‹ cá»§a mÃ¬nh nÃªn cáº£m_tháº¥y khÃ´ng ngon láº¯m ! mÃ¬nh kÃªu kem xÃ´i dá»«a , 27k mÃ  nhÃ¬n dá»…_thÆ°Æ¡ng vÃ¬ nÃ³ nhá»_xÃ­u Ã  . xÃ´i thÃ¬ cá»©ng mÃ  láº¡t nhÃ¡ch cÃ²n kem thÃ¬ cÅ©ng ko ngon .

mÃ¬nh há»c á»Ÿ gáº§n quÃ¡n nÃ y nÃªn trong nÄƒm tá»¥_táº­p cÅ©ng hay vÃ o . quÃ¡n Ä‘Æ°á»£c_cÃ¡i ráº» nhÆ°ng Ä‘á»“_Äƒn thá»±c_sá»± ráº¥t tá»‡ . táº¥t_cáº£ cÃ¡c loáº¡i trá»™n thÃ¬ cÃ¹ng trá»™n 1 loáº¡i nÆ°á»›c sá»‘t cÃ _chua ngá»t ngá»t . gimbab Äƒn ko ngon báº±ng tá»± lÃ m . má»³ Ä‘en Äƒn cháº£ cÃ³ vá»‹ gÃ¬ ngoÃ i vá»‹ gá»«ng . Ä‘á»c cÃ¡c bÃ¬nh_luáº­n tháº¥y cÃ¡c Ä‘Ã¡nh_giÃ¡ Ä‘á»u á»•n nÃªn mÃ¬nh thá»­ ghÃ© qua quÃ¡n xem sao nhÆ°ng nÃ³i_chung lÃ  chÃ¡n + ngÃ¡n . vá»‹_trÃ­ thÃ¬ nÃ³i_chung khÃ´ng nÃ³i lÃ m_gÃ¬ , giÃ¡_cáº£ cÅ©ng bÃ¬nh_dÃ¢n nhÆ° cÃ¡c quÃ¡n_Äƒn váº·t khÃ¡c . cháº¥t_lÆ°á»£ng cÃ¡c mÃ³n Äƒn thÃ¬ ngá»t : mÃ¬nh Ä‘i 2 ngÆ°á»i gá»i - trÃ  xanh thÃ¡i lan , trÃ  sá»¯a trÃ¢n_chÃ¢u , há»“_lÃ´ chiÃªn , kimbab chiÃªn , hÃ¡ cáº£o , sá»¯a_tÆ°Æ¡i chiÃªn , khoai_mÃ´n lá»‡ phá»‘ , má»³ spaghetti bÃ² . cÃ¡c mÃ³n ra háº¿t riÃªng khoai_mÃ´n thÃ¬ cÃ¡c báº¡n Ã½ quÃªn , má»³ spaghetti vÃ  sá»¯a_tÆ°Æ¡i chiÃªn Äƒn Ä‘Æ°á»£c cÃ²n cÃ¡c mÃ³n cÃ²n láº¡i thÃ¬ ngá»t , bÃ¬nh_thÆ°á»ng . khÃ´ng_gian thÃ¬ cháº£ á»•n chÃºt nÃ o - táº§ng 1 á»“n_Ã o - do lÃ m Ä‘á»“ , táº§ng 2 thÃ¬ hÃ´m_nay cÃ³ 1 nhÃ³m hÆ¡n 20 chá»¥c báº¡n tá»¥ tÃ¢p nÃªn khÃ´ng yÃªn_tÄ©nh . nÃ³i_chung lÃ  khÃ´ng hÃ i lonngf vÃ  sáº½ khÃ´ng trá»Ÿ_láº¡i , quay vá» quÃ¡n quen_thuá»™c thÃ´i .
á»Ÿ Ä‘Ã¢y chá»‰ Ä‘c khung_cáº£nh mÃ¡t_máº» chá»© ko cÃ³ gÃ¬ Ä‘áº·c_sáº¯c . chá»n giÃ¡ vÃ© trá»n_gÃ³i 330kngÆ°á»i bao_gá»“m Ä‘á»“_Äƒn & trÃ¡i_cÃ¢y nhÆ°ng Ä‘á»“_Äƒn ráº¥t Ã­t , táº¡m Ä‘Æ°á»£c , há»“ bÆ¡i nhá» , ko Ä‘áº¹p , náº¯ng . gá»i thÃªm Ä‘á»“_Äƒn hay bia thÃ¬ giÃ¡ cá»±c máº¯c , karaoke 300k  h . nÃ³i_chung ko cÃ³ gÃ¬ Ä‘á»ƒ vui_chÆ¡i , Äƒn_uá»‘ng mÃ  bá» ra sá»‘ tiá»n nhÆ°_váº­y thÃ¬ quÃ¡ máº¯c , cháº¥t_lÆ°á»£ng kÃ©m .

láº§n Ä‘áº§u_tiÃªn lÃ  láº§n cuá»‘i_cÃ¹ng . Ä‘á»“ uá»‘ng cá»‘c nhá» mÃ _láº¡i cÃ²n Ä‘áº¯t ná»¯a . vÃ o thÃ¬ máº¥t tiá»n gá»­i xe ná»¯a_lÃ  ko thÃ­ch r ...
i usually don ' t write negative reviews . but i guess there is a first for everything . i came here yesterday around lunch time with 2 other guest . before entering the store , i saw a few people in the buffet , i looked at the sashimi and sushi from outside and they looked very declicuis . i went in sat down and order the buffet meal . drinks : water melon juice - very nice gava_juice ( oi ) - very nice foods : all the meats here had no flavour , i had to order chopped garlic on the side so i could dip the meat in it so there was some flavour . i also remember ordering salt and pepper so i could dip the meats in it as well before cooking . for the price i paid , i expect there to be flavour in the meat . their_sashimi_plate outside was never refilled . i remembering try to back for some sashimi salmon but it was always gone . even the hot_pot had no flavour . honestly for the price i had for the total meal which was around 1million dong , it was not worth it . staff : they were friendly and fast with my orders . i can not find a problem with them . ambiance : outside and interior was renovated very nicely , i can see the owner most of put alot of money into the place to dress it up . the shop was clean tables chairs floors were clean . wifi here was slow though . return : no price : expensive

that su la rat thich mon mien xao o day , khong gian dep va gia noi chung cung tuong doi la cao . van de o day minh muon noi sau hon ve cach phuc vu cua nhan vien , khach thi ko han la dong , nhung cung ngoi het day gan cua kieng , khongg he co ai dung gan nhung ban do de phuc vu cho khach khi can , nhan vien khoang 4 nguoi va ca quan ly nua . dung ngay truoc cua noi chuyen cuoi dua , minh phai dich than ra de nho phuc vu . con luc bung do an ra , báº¡n_trai de dia xuong ban cu nhu la nem vao mat khÃ¡ch . neu do an ngon , khong gian dep vay ma cach phuc vu ko on thi can dieu chinh lai cho hoan hao hon .

qua Ì n na Ì€ y Ä‘o Ì ng cÆ° Ì‰ a lÃ¢u rÃ´ Ì€ i . ad gÆ¡ Ìƒ ba Ì€ i xuÃ´ Ì ng Ä‘i , Ä‘Ãª Ì‰ mo Ì£ i ngÆ°Æ¡ Ì€ i mÃ¢ Ì t cÃ´ng_ti Ì€ m . thaks !
first off , runam bistro is extremely well designed . whoever was responsible for the design and layout of the restaurant deserves some kind of award , because it ' s a really beautiful place and has a great atmosphere . unfortunately , the food doesn ' t follow suit . the menu seems to have been designed by someone who has travelled a bit , made a list of all their favourite dishes , and then thrown them all on the same menu . definitely not put together by a chef , and sadly not cooked by chefs experienced with western cuisine either . we visited with 8 friends and tried numerous items off the menu . they ranged from average to bland - badly seasoned imported ingredients that were clearly frozen to begin with . a nice place for drinks and desert ( the coffee is pretty good too ) , but the food is a big disappointment , especially if you ' re a westerner .

very nice space but overpriced for vn coffee ! cause you have to add 10% vat + 5% service charge and they only use vn coffee which is basically the cheapest . a cappuccino comes out 80k ! as expensive as coffee_bean  starbucks which are imported coffee ( means tax ) . waitress i don ' t know why but did not smile , like we are bothering her ... not worth the service charge at all ! ! ! the waiter who came first was indeed professional and smile . if waitresses do not like this job , they should go for another job . simple as that .

vá»‹_trÃ­ quÃ¡n khÃ¡ dá»… tÃ¬m , rá»™ng_rÃ£i , thoÃ¡ng . vá» mÃ³n Äƒn : Æ°á»›p ráº¥t vá»«a Äƒn , thÆ¡m ná»¯a , Ä‘á»“_Äƒn ráº¥t lÃ  tÆ°Æ¡i , bÃ² cuá»™n kim chÃ¢m nÆ°á»›ng cháº¥m vá»›i muá»‘i á»›t xanh lÃ  tuyá»‡t_vá»i luÃ´n áº¥y , vÃº heo cÅ©ng ráº¥t lÃ  giÃ²n vÃ  thÆ¡m . vá» giÃ¡_cáº£ : mÃ¬nh tháº¥y giÃ¡ ráº¥t há»£p_lÃ½ , phÃ¹_há»£p cho cÃ¡c báº¡n sinh_viÃªn . vá» phá»¥c_vá»¥ : nhÃ¢n_viÃªn ráº¥t thÃ¢n_thiá»‡n , nhiá»‡t_tÃ¬nh vÃ  nhanh_nháº¹n .

although i did not expect too much , because i ' m in vietnam . but i was suprrised at the same quality of japanese noodles . i ' m happy to be able to eat this in vietnam .
i went to eat udon with my vietnamese friends today . i like the way they display tempura and some fried food ( fried chicken , etc ) . i was very good and super cheap . i had curru udon and some tempura and costs me only $ 3-4 . i will go back there and try some more different udon .
